title: Clean Green Drinks (gnv64)
description:
Clean Green Drinks: 100+ Cleansing Recipes to Renew & Restore Your Body and Mind 
by Candice Kumai
Galvanized Books | April 2014 | ISBN-10: 055339083X | ePUB | 89 pages | 20.2 mb

Cleanse. Sculpt your body, boost your health, renew your mind, and improve your whole outlook on life.
Clean Green Drinks is not just a recipe collection, but also a guide to a leaner, happier, and more fulfilled you. With more than 100 perfectly balanced, delicious drink recipes that can be made in a minute, Clean Green Drinks will help you sip away extra pounds as you sip away stress. Health journalist and chef Candice Kumai reveals the new science behind her enticing, refreshing flavors; and shows how easy it is to get fit, healthy, happy, and glowing!

About the Author
Candice Kumai, former host of LifetimeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Cook Yourself Thin and TLCÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Homemade Simple, had traveled across Asia, New York City, and Los Angeles as a fashion model by the age of fifteen. At twenty-two, she received her professional culinary training at Le Cordon Bleu College of Culinary Arts in Los Angeles and cooked in several California-based restaurants. Candice was the youngest chef to compete on BravoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s inaugural season of Top Chef at age twenty-three. As a major influencer by the age of thirty, Candice wrote and developed recipes for more than half a dozen cookbooks, including the New York Times #1 bestseller Cook Yourself Thin, Skinny Bitch Cookbook, Recipe Rehab, and Novak DjokovicÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Serve to Win. Her cookbooks include Pretty Delicious, Cook Yourself Sexy, and Clean Green Drinks. Candice is featured in and contributes to dozens of food, health, beauty, fashion, and lifestyle shows and publications.
Candice is currently a regular judge on Food NetworkÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Iron Chef America, a health journalist, and food editor-at-large at Shape and MenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Fitness magazines.
